name: Smile Slumber Story JAM EDITION
description:
Just what the title says.

Nothing more or less.  Tons of references to SGB developers, games, asset creators, and fourth wall breaking.

Some collision missing as well.

Trigger warning:  The hidden game "Abandoned Village" contains implied descriptions of torture and generally ghastly things.

Enjoy :)

(Aqua, Rhia, and Anna appear courtesy of their respective creators Patchwork, DaleDawg and MidoSensha Studios; Dr. Sap just reluctantly does whatever I tell them.)
